veravitalize_tag: Tag: UI/UX Design - Web Development - 3D Modeling
veravitalize_tmi: VeraVitalize is a brand about aloe vera skin care products, they wanted to show to the internet their main product in a intuitive and transparency way. There are a lot of skincare products out there, including aloe vera products. However, one way to distinguish a good product from anotheris their online presentation. For VeraVitalize, the most appealing idea was to showcase their product on the web using 3D modeling, with the aim of inspiring confidence in users. This technique not only enhances the visual experience for users, but also allows them to examine the product from all angles, generating trust and transparency.
veravitalize_tech:
â€¢ Rearch: I analyzed current design and website trends.
â€¢ 3D Modeling: The product has been modeled in 3D using Blender and Maya. This included realistic texturing and animations showing the use and benefits of aloe vera. 
 â€¢ Web Integration: I implemented the 3D models on the website using technologies compatible with most browsers, ensuring fast loading and smooth navigation.
veravitalize_objetive:
â€¢ Differentiation: Create a unique way of presenting the product online, to differentiate yourself within a saturated market. 
 â€¢ User Experience: Implement 3D models so that customers interact in a better way with the product. 
 â€¢ Follow the brand ideology: Its idea of â€‹â€‹being a transparent brand, creating a transparent product.
services_p: Let's work together, my services ensure transparent communication through your preferred channel: email, WhatsApp, Instagram. What does your brand need? If you're not sure, you can ask me for a free consultation.
service_1_description: I turn your ideas into professional visuals. From logos to marketing materials, I create designs that capture your brand and communicate your message effectively.
service_2_description: I build custom websites that look great and work smoothly. Using the latest tech, I ensure your site is fast, secure, and scalable.
service_3_description: I design easy-to-use interfaces and engaging experiences. My user-focused approach makes sure every design is intuitive and visually appealing, boosting user satisfaction and retention.
veraVitalizeMisionP: VeraVitalize is an Aloe Vera cream. My mission was to design the product, create its online presence and develop an interactive website using 3D models with ThreeJS to improve the presentation of the product online
veraVitalizeObjetiveP: Design a cream that reflects the benefits of Aloe Vera, create a website that educates and engages customers about the products and their benefits, and develop an interactive experience with 3D models to enhance online product visualization.
veraVitalizeProcessP: We began researching the benefits of Aloe Vera and designed a product that reflected these properties. We then developed a website with educational and visual sections using 3D models created with ThreeJS for an immersive experience.
veraVitalizeResultP: VeraVitalize has significantly improved its online presence, attracting more customers interested in the benefits of Aloe Vera and improving product visualization with interactive 3D models
